Into a large skillet over medium-high heat, add 1 tbsp olive oil. When the oil is hot, add 1/2 of the cubed tofu in an even layer. Cook for 5 minutes.
In a small bowl, whisk together the mint, basil, parsley, lemon juice, and remaining olive oil. Season with salt and pepper, to taste
In a large salad bowl, mix together the couscous, tofu, tomatoes, and bell peppers. Drizzle with dressing, stirring to combine.

name: Cowboy Caviar
instructions: Combine olive oil, vegetable oil, cider vinegar, and sugar in a saucepan, bring to a boil, remove from heat, and cool to room temperature.
Stir pinto beans, black-eyed peas, corn, onion, celery, red bell pepper, and cilantro together in a large bowl.
Pour cooled oil mixture over bean mixture and toss to coat. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate, stirring occasionally, for 24 hours.

name: Cranberry-Crusted Salmon
ingredientLines: ¾ lb salmon, cut into fillets
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place the salmon on the prepared sheet, skin side down. Season with salt and pepper.
In a bowl, combine the cranberries, oil, agave syrup and mustard. Spread over the salmon. Bake for 15 minutes or until the salmon is cooked medium rare.
Serve hot or at room temperature.

name: Cream Of Asparagus Soup
instructions: Separate asparagus tips and stalk pieces, and set asparagus tips aside.
Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat, cook and stir onion until tender, 5 to 10 minutes. Add garlic, cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Mix chicken broth, asparagus stalk pieces, carrots, parsley, basil, pepper, and salt into onion mixture, bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium and simmer until asparagus and carrots are tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
Pour soup into a blender no more than half full, add nutritional yeast. Cover and hold lid down, pulse a few times before leaving on to blend.
Puree in batches until smooth. Return soup to saucepan, add asparagus tips, and stir in cream. Simmer soup until tips are tender, about 5 minutes.

name: Cream Of Mushroom Soup With Croutons
ingredientLines: 1/4 tsp freshly ground black pepper plus more for seasoning
7 oz sourdough bread cut into cubes
1 large clove of garlic sliced lengthways
instructions: Make the croutons first.
Preheat the oven to 356°F, please adjust temperature according to your own oven. Heat the oil in a skillet over a medium to high heat.
Add the garlic and leaves from 1 sprig of thyme, then cook for about 2 minutes. Remove the garlic.
Carefully transfer the oil to a large bowl then add the bread. Mix with a large spoon so the bread is lightly coated in the oil.
Spread the bread out on a baking tray and bake in the middle of the oven for 8 minutes.
While the croutons are baking start making the soup. Melt the butter in a large saucepan, add the onion and gently cook for about 5 minutes until the onion is soft.
Meanwhile, remove the crouton tray from the oven then sprinkle the parmesan over the croutons, toss the croutons, then return to the oven and bake for another 5 minutes.
When they are crispy and golden brown, remove from oven sprinkle with the sea salt and leave to cool.
Keep any leftover croutons in an airtight container and use within a week.
For the soup, once onion is done, add the garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Then add the mushrooms, thyme, nutmeg, salt and black pepper, turn up the heat to medium hot and cook the mushrooms for about 10 minutes until they release all their juicy goodness.
Now sprinkle the mushrooms with the flour and add the stock, stir then leave to simmer for about 10 minutes. Test the seasoning and add more pepper if you need it.
Remove the thyme sprigs when the soup has thickened slightly then turn off the heat and blend the soup with a hand blender.
Once the soup is smooth return it to the heat, add the cream and bring the soup to a fast simmer.
Serve immediately with the croutons.

name: Creamy Broccoli-Cauliflower Soup
ingredientLines: Freshly cracked black pepper, to taste
instructions: Heat the oil in a large saucepan, add the onion and cook gently over medium heat for 5 minutes.
Add the celery and cook for another 5 minutes until the onion is soft. Add the rest of the ingredients and stir well.
Bring to the boil then reduce the heat and simmer with a lid on for 20 minutes.
Remove the bay leaves then blitz the soup with a hand-held blender until you have a smooth creamy soup.

name: Creamy Brussels Sprouts
ingredientLines: 2 lb Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
In the same pan, melt the butter, then add the Brussels sprouts and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes.
Add in the garlic and stir it through the sprouts for a minute, until fragrant. Pour in the cream and simmer for 3 minutes.
Top the sprouts with the mozzarella and bake for 15 minutes.

name: Creamy Cauliflower Soup
instructions: Coat the bottom of a large pot with oil and place it over medium heat.
When the oil is hot, add the onion and saute until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the garlic, ginger, curry and protein powder, cumin and turmeric. Continue to saute for about 30 seconds, until the garlic is very fragrant.
Stir in the coconut milk, broth, and cauliflower florets.
Raise the heat and bring the liquid to a boil. Lower the heat and allow it to simmer until the cauliflower is soft, about 15 minutes.
Blend the soup with  blender until smooth. Return the soup to the pot. Season with salt and pepper and ladle into bowls.

name: Creamy Cheesy Zucchini Soup
instructions: Put zucchini in large Dutch oven with a few inches of water. Simmer zucchini over medium-low heat until tender when poked with a fork, about 20 minutes.
Use a slotted spoon to transfer zucchini to a blender, leaving about 1 inch of water in the bottom of the pot.
Blend zucchini until no large chunks remain, return to the pot. Combine bell pepper, red onions, and basil in the blender, blend until no large pieces remain.
Stir bell pepper mixture into the blended zucchini, add cream, Swiss cheese, salt, and pepper.
Cook over medium-low heat until warmed through and the cheese is melted, 5 to 7 minutes.

name: Creamy Chicken Spinach Farfalle
instructions: Add peas, cream and stock and bring to the boil, stirring. Simmer for 5 minutes. Season to taste,
Add chicken, spinach and parmesan, stirring to combine. Cook for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook fusilli in a large saucepan of boiling water according to pack instructions. Drain well. Return to pan. Toss sauce with pasta and serve.

name: Creamy Garlic Chicken Soup
instructions: Melt butter in saucepan over medium heat. Add shredded chicken to pan and coat with melted butter.
As chicken begins to warm, add cubes of cream cheese and garlic powder. Mix to blend ingredients.
Once the cream cheese has melted and is evenly distributed, add chicken broth and heavy cream. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 3 minutes.
Add salt to taste and serve.

name: Creamy Garlic Pasta With Shaved Brussels Sprouts
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water.
In a blender combine the cashews, garlic, nutritional yeast, salt, and water. Blend until smooth and creamy, pausing to scrape down the sides as needed.
Melt 1 tbsp of olive oil in a medium pot over medium-low and add the arrowroot powder. Let the mixture cook until the powder is golden and a couple of shades darker.
Slowly pour in the garlic-cashew mixture while whisking to prevent clumps. Turn up the heat to medium and bring the sauce to a simmer and let it simmer until thickened.
Pour the sauce into the pasta and stir to coat. Add some of the reserved pasta water if necessary. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Trim off the ends of the sprouts and remove any damaged leaves. Cut the sprouts in half, then thinly slice.
Heat the remaining oil in a skillet over medium heat and add the shaved sprouts with some salt. Cook about 6 minutes.
Place the pasta in a serving dish. Top with the cooked sprouts and serve.

name: Creamy Garlic-Lemon Fettucine
instructions: In a large pot, combine the garlic and olive oil and bring  to a gentle simmer. Cook them for 3 minutes, until the garlic has softened and just started to brown.
Add the veggie broth to the garlic and bring it to a boil. Add the spaghetti, milk, and juice. Stir everything nicely, cover , and cook for 12 minutes, stirring occasionally.
At this point, add the spinach and cook for 1 more minute, until it wilts. Finally, add the lemon zest, salt, red pepper flakes, and parsley. Stir and serve.

name: Creamy Jalapeno Tagliatelle
instructions: In a pot with boiling water add the tagliatelle.  Follow the instruction of your spaghetti brand. It usually takes about 8 minutes to cook.
Place the oil in a pan and let it warmup. Saute the onion and garlic.
Roast the jalapeno by toasting by bathing it in a little oil and then placing it straight into the stove flame.
In the blender add the cream, the milk, salt, and jalapeno.
Blend and the taste. Add more jalapeno if you prefer it spicier or add more salt to taste.
Get rid of the water were the pasta cooked and place the pasta back in the pot. Add the lender mix to the pasta as well as the cheese.
Mix all together and garnish with orange, arugula, and few slices od jalapeno.

name: Creamy Kale Pasta
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain, save a cup of the pasta water and set aside.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and saute for 3 minutes.
Add the cream to the pan and bring to a simmer. Add in the grated parmesan and whisk. Mix in the kale. Let the sauce simmer for a minute and add some pasta water.
Toss in the pasta and chopped walnuts. Serve immediately.

name: Creamy Lemon Spinach Pasta
instructions: In a medium skillet bring water to a boil. Add salt and linguine. Cook according to package directions.
In a pan add cooking cream over medium heat. Add spinach and cook until it wilts.
Turn off heat and stir in lemon zest and juice and salt. Season with fresh pepper to taste.
Turn heat to medium and stir to incorporate spinach mixture with pasta. Serve immediately with some Parmesan cheese.

name: Creamy Mushroom And Spinach Tagliatelle
instructions: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan over a medium heat and fry the onion and mushrooms for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a boiling water cook the pasta following pack instructions.
Add the garlic to the pan with the mushrooms and cook for 2 minutes more.
Tip in coconut cream and Parmesan. Stir to combine, then add the spinach. Set aside.
Remove the pasta from the heat and drain.  Toss the pasta in the creamy mushroom sauce, put back on the heat and cook until the spinach wilts.
Season with black pepper, toss, and serve.

name: Creamy Pesto Chicken Skillet
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Season chicken thighs with salt, pepper and red chili flakes.
Heat oil in skillet over medium high heat and, once hot, sear the chicken skin side down for 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate.
In the same pan, discard excess oil if any, leaving behind some oil and add garlic and stir well.
Add in pesto and combine well. Cook for a couple of minutes. Add in cream and mix well.
Transfer the chicken thighs back into the skillet, skin side up. Cover and cook on medium low till chicken is cooked through and internal temperature reaches at least 165°F.
In the last 3 minutes, add in tomatoes. Taste and adjust the seasonings to your liking. Serve immediately.

name: Creamy Potato Chowder With Shrimp
instructions: Heat a large dutch oven over medium heat. Add bacon and cook for 5 minutes. Turn off heat and place bacon on a plate lined with paper towels.
Drain all but 1 tablespoon of bacon fat out of the pan. Turn heat to medium-high and cook shrimp for about 2 minutes on each side. Set aside.
Drain all of the cooking liquid out of the pan. Place garlic and onion into the dutch oven. Cook for 2 minutes. Add potato, celery, and carrots. Cook until potato softens.
Add in spices. Cook for 1 minute. Pour in chicken stock and stir well, making sure to scrape up all of the brown bits from the bottom of the pan.
Cover and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Once at a boil, add corn and turn down heat and let simmer for 10 minutes.
Whisk in cashew cream. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Serve immediately.

name: Creamy Salmon Zoodles
instructions: Heat a large frying pan over high heat. Add the cream and lemon juice. Bring to a boil. Cook for 3 minutes.
Add the zucchini, salmon, half the lemon zest and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes.

name: Creamy Seafood Pasta
instructions: Bring salted water in a skillet to a boil, add spaghetti and cook according to package instructions, for 8 minutes.
In a large pan, add a splash of oil and allow to heat up.
Season the seafood with salt and pepper then cook in batches until golden brown.

Remove the seafood from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, melt the butter and add the garlic .

Cook until fragrant then pour in the lemon juice and wine.
Bring to a simmer and allow to reduce by half.
Pour in the cream and allow to come to a simmer. Allow to cook for 5 minutes or until the sauce coats the back of a spoon.
Add the seafood and stir to combine. Toss the sauce with cooked pasta and a splash of the pasta cooking water and toss to coat the pasta.

name: Creamy Sweet Potato Soup With Bacon
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Place potatoes, cut-side down, in a large microwave-safe baking dish. Add ½ cup water and cover with plastic wrap. Microwave on high for 15 minutes.
Let cool slightly, then squeeze sweet potato flesh out of skins. Discard skins.
Add olive oil to a medium saucepan set to medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic, sauteing for 2 minutes. Stir in chili powder, salt, cumin and cinnamon.
Add sweet potatoes and broth. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat. Using a handheld immersion blender, blend soup until smooth.
Return soup to saucepan and stir. Ladle soup into individual serving bowls and top with bacon and parsley. Serve immediately along with toast.

name: Creamy Vegan Spinach Orzo
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Combine the vegetable broth and oat milk in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil.
Add the orzo and cook for 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Reduce the heat to medium-low and add the nutritional yeast, salt, pepper, and spinach.
Keep cooking for about 3 minutes, until the spinach wilts down. Add salt and pepper to taste. Stir, and remove from heat. Serve immediately.

name: Crepes With Spinach And Mozzarella
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
To make the crepes, beat all ingredients well. Cook in a pan, 3 minutes on each side.
In a large skillet, saute the onion and garlic in butter until golden brown.
Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the spinach, salt, pepper and mozzarella.
Fill the crepes with the spinach mixture, top with some mozzarella and bake for 15 minutes.

name: Crescent Breakfast Pockets
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
Unroll crescent dough and separate into triangles. Slice sausage into coin-sized pieces.
Melt ghee in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add eggs and sausage pieces and season with salt and pepper.
Cook, stirring, until cooked through, about 2 minutes. Place about 2 tablespoons of filling and some Cheddar cheese onto the crescent triangles.
Cook in the air fryer until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Crispy Baked Chicken Wings
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Line a shallow baking dish with aluminum foil and grease lightly.
Cut tips from chicken wings and discard. Cut between the joint to separate each wing into 2 pieces.
Combine ghee and garlic in a small saucepan over low heat; heat until butter is melted and garlic is fragrant, 3 to 5 minutes.
Mix Parmesan cheese, parsley, oregano, paprika, salt, and pepper together in a shallow bowl.
Dip chicken wing pieces in melted ghee mixture, coat with Parmesan cheese mixture in the bowl.
Arrange in the prepared baking dish. Drizzle any remaining ghee on top.
Bake in the preheated oven until skin is browned and juices run clear, about 1 hour.

name: Crispy Chicken Dippers
ingredientLines: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, sliced into strips
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
In a shallow bowl, whisk together egg. In another shallow bowl, mix together coconut, almond flour and salt.
Dredge chicken strips in the whisked egg, then straight to the coconut mixture. Coat on all sides then place on a plate. Repeat with all chicken strips.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the strips to the pan. Cook for 1 minute on both sides. Place strips on a cooling rack.
Place baking sheet in the oven and cook for 10 minutes or until no pink remains inside the chicken. Let cool on baking sheet before serving.

name: Crispy Gnocchi With Mushrooms
instructions: In a boiling salted water add gnocchi and cook according to a package directions.
Heat up oil in a pan and roast gnocchi for 3 minutes on each side.
Add garlic, onion, and mushrooms and roast for 5 minutes, until crispy. Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with Parmesan and parsley, and serve.

name: Croque Madame With Spinach
ingredientLines: 2 thin slices ham, trimmed of fat
2 oz mature cheddar or other melting cheese, grated
½ tsp cider or white wine vinegar
1 tsp mild olive oil, plus a little for frying
instructions: Heat the frying pan to high and lightly toast the bread on both sides.
Spread 1 tsp mustard over one side, then top with the ham and cheese.
Whisk the remaining mustard and vinegar with 1 tsp oil and seasoning to make the dressing for the spinach.
Grill the croque for 3 mins, or until the cheese is bubbling and turning golden.
Meanwhile, heat a non-stick frying pan.
Add a little oil, then crack in the egg and gently fry to your liking.
When cooked, lift it on top of the toast.
Toss the dressing with the spinach, and cornichons if using,  Plate the entire meal and serve immediately.

name: Crustless Mini Quiches
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Oil a standard muffin tin.
Spray a skillet with nonstick spray. Saute spinach over medium-low heat just until wilted, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat.
Divide bacon among the muffin cups. Squeeze moisture out of the spinach and place on top of bacon.
Sprinkle with chives, then top with equal portions of Swiss cheese.
Blend eggs, cream, seasoning blend, onion powder, garlic powder, and pepper in a mixing bowl.
Pour mixture slowly into each cup, stopping just before it reaches the top.
Bake in the preheated oven until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, about 25 minutes.
Remove from the oven and let rest for 5 minutes before serving, it's normal for puffy quiche to settle and flatten.

name: Cucumber Pasta Salad
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and rinse well under cold water.
In a large mixing bowl, place the pasta, cucumbers, bell pepper and dill. Add salt and pepper to taste. Stir everything well and serve.

name: Cucumber-Melon Gazpacho
ingredientLines: 1 tbsp unflavored pea protein powder (or other)
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a blender, puree all the ingredients until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer to a large bowl and refrigerate for 30 minutes or until completely chilled.
Thin out with water, if desired. Adjust the seasoning and serve.

name: Cucumber-Radish Salad
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Thinly slice the radishes and cucumber with a knife or mandoline. In a small bowl, stir together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
In a medium mixing bowl, add the cucumber, radishes, green onion, dill, and dressing. Stir to combine.
Transfer the salad to a serving bowl and sprinkle with sesame seeds, salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

name: Curried Cauliflower Soup
instructions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until onion softens.
Add curry paste and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add the cauliflower, stock and water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes.
Transfer half the cauliflower mixture to a clean saucepan. Blend the remaining cauliflower mixture, until smooth.
Add to saucepan with unblended cauliflower mixture. Add coconut cream and stir over medium heat for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat, garnish with parsley and season with salt .

name: Dakos
ingredientLines: Fresh cracked black pepper, to taste
instructions: Spray the slices of bread with water to moisten them. Roughly grate the tomato or chop it into small cubes.
Spread the grated tomato on the cracker and top with cheese. Sprinkle with pepper and a good amount of oregano.
Drizzle with olive oil, add a couple of olives to each slice of bread and enjoy!

name: Date And Lime Muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F. Line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners.
Mix all of the dry ingredients in a bowl and all of the wet ingredients in a larger bowl.
Add the dry ingredients to the wet and, with a spatula or whisk, mix until everything's well incorporated.
Divide the muffin batter equall between the tins, smooth the tops with a spatula. Bake for 23 minutes.
Remove to a rack to cool. After 15 minutes, unmold the muffins and continue to cool on the rack.

name: Detox Broccoli Soup
instructions: In a large stockpot over medium heat saute onion, celery, garlic, and broccoli stems for 5 minutes in olive oil.
Add turmeric, salt, and pepper. Saute additional 1 minute.
Add stock and broccoli florets, bring to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes or until broccoli is tender.
Add spinach and allow to wilt. Transfer soup to a blender, add yeast and puree until smooth.
Transfer into pot again, season with salt and pepper, add coconut milk and cook for a minute. Serve.

name: Dong Po
instructions: Slice the pork belly into 2-inch wide strips. Bring a large pot of water to a boil, and stir in the pork slices.
Reduce heat to a simmer, and cook the meat for 10 minutes. Remove from the water, and blot dry with paper towels.
Heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat in a large wok, and brown the pork strips well on all sides.
While pork is browning, mix together soy sauce, rice wine, ginger, yeast and spring onions in a large soup pot or stockpot.
Bring the mixture to a boil for 5 minutes. Reduce heat to a gentle simmer, and lay the pork strips into the liquid.
Cover, and simmer until the meat is very tender, 1 to 1 1/2 hour. Add water as needed to keep the liquid from going completely dry.
Serve and sprinkle with sesame seeds and top parsley.

name: Dry Rub Chicken Wings
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 350°F.
Whisk together paprika, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, poultry seasoning, mustard powder, and pepper in a large bowl.
Toss in chicken wings and rub seasonings into chicken with your hands until fully coated.
Arrange wings in the air fryer basket, standing them up on their ends and leaning against each other and the wall of the basket.
Cook in the preheated air fryer until wings are tender inside and golden brown and crisp on the outside, about 35 minutes. Transfer wings to a plate and serve hot.

name: Easy Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Prepare a large baking sheet by placing a metal cooling rack on the tray and spraying with olive oil.
Combine chicken, peppers, onion, oil, seasoning, and lime juice together in a large bowl.  Toss well.
Place mixture on the rack in an even layer.  Bake for 15 minutes, until chicken is cooked through.
Turn the oven broiler on and place under the broiler for about 2 minutes.

name: Easy Chorizo Street Tacos
instructions: Mix chorizo and chipotle peppers in adobo sauce together in a bowl.
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat, add chorizo mixture and cook until crisp, 5 to 7 minutes.
Transfer chorizo to a plate, reserving grease in the skillet.
Heat tortillas in the reserved grease in skillet over medium heat until warmed, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
Stack 2 tortillas on top of each other for each taco. Fill with chorizo, onion, and cilantro.

name: Easy Vegan Potato Soup
instructions: Combine water, cashew milk, brown rice, red potatoes, cabbage, carrots and onion.
Add olive oil, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and onion powder in a very large pot over medium heat and bring to a boil.
Boil for 5 minutes, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 3 hours. Stir occasionally while simmering and add any extra seasonings as desired.

name: Easy Zucchini Fritters
instructions: Toss zucchini and salt together in a large colander and place in sink to drain for 10 minutes.
Transfer zucchini to the center of a piece of cheesecloth, wrap cheesecloth around zucchini and squeeze to drain as much moisture as possible.
Mix flour, Parmesan cheese, egg, and garlic together in a large bowl. Stir in zucchini, then season with kosher salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Working in batches, scoop tablespoonfuls of zucchini mixture into the hot skillet and fry until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side.

name: Egg And Asparagus
instructions: For the hollandaise, put the egg yolks, 2 tbsp butter, lemon juice and a tablespoon of cold water water into a heavy-based pan and place over the lowest possible heat.
Using a balloon whisk, immediately begin whisking until the butter has melted and has combined with the egg yolks and liquid.
Once the butter has completely melted, turn up the heat ever so slightly and keep whisking continuously until the sauce has thickened.
For the poached egg and asparagus, bring a pan of salted water to the boil and cook the asparagus in the boiling water for 2 minutes.
Reduce the heat to the lowest setting, until the water is barely simmering. Crack the eggs into a cup and gently lower into the water, tipping out the eggs.
Cook for 3 minutes, or until the whites have set and the yolks are cooked to your liking. Remove and drain on kitchen paper.
In a medium skillet heat butter and add asparagus and sliced mushrooms. Season with salt and pepper and cook for 5 minutes.
Toast the bread and top with mushrooms, asparagus, eggs and hollandaise sauce.

name: Egg And Cheese Muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease the muffin pan with butter.
In a large measuring cup or bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Pour egg mixture into prepared pan, filling cups about ⅔ full.
Sprinkle cheese evenly among the cups. Bake for approximately 10 minutes, or until eggs set.

name: Egg Bacon Green Beans
instructions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly browned but only slightly crisp.
Drain grease, leaving a small amount in the skillet for later use. Crumble bacon, reserving 2 tablespoons for garnish, and set aside.
Cook frozen beans in a covered, microwavable dish for about 3 minutes until thawed, but not fully cooked. Drain liquid, pat dry, and set aside.
Reheat skillet with residual bacon grease over medium-high heat. Add eggs and cook until preffered. Remove.
Stir in bacon and garlic until garlic is lightly golden. Add green beans and season with onion powder and black pepper.
ransfer to a serving dish, and garnish with egg and crumbled bacon. Serve hot.

name: Egg Baked In Potatoes
instructions: Wrap shredded potatoes in cheesecloth and wring out until dry, approximately 2 minutes. Place in a large bowl and add salt, pepper, garlic and onion.
Heat a nonstick skillet on medium-high heat and add oil.
Place 1/2 cup of the shredded potato mixture in an even layer and cook for approximately 2 minutes until golden.
Flip and use a round cookie cutter to remove the center of the patty. Drop a single egg in the patty and cook until whites are set.
Remove patty from pan and repeat until all potatoes are used. Serve with cherry tomatoes.

name: Egg Casserole With Zucchini And Ham
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Set aside a lightly greased, 9"x 9" baking dish.
Whisk the eggs and milk together. Add the softened cream cheese. Add the ham, spring onion, zucchini, and half of cheese. Add salt and pepper.
Stir and pour into a greased baking dish. Cover with the remaining cheese. Bake for 20 minutes, or until the middle is set. Serve immediately.

name: Egg In A Pepper
instructions: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Place bell pepper rings in the hot skillet. Crack eggs into bell peppers ring and cook until bottom holds together and corners are browned.
Flip and cook until desired doneness is reached, 3 minutes more. Season with salt and ground black pepper and serve.

name: Egg Muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F.. Grease 9 muffin cups with olive oil.
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, 5 to 10 minutes.
Transfer bacon to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.
Saute onion, spinach, and mushrooms in the same skillet until onions are soft, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat and cool slightly.
Blend onion mixture in a blender until smooth. Beat onion mixture, eggs, feta cheese, and bacon together in a bowl until batter is well-combined.
Pour batter into prepared muffin cups. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, about 35 minutes.

name: Egg Omelet Rolls
instructions: Whisk the eggs well with the milk and season with salt and pepper.
Mix the cream cheese with the herbs and season to taste.
Heat the butter on a skillet over medium heat. Make 2 omelets one after the other.
Once cooked, remove omelet from pan and spread with the herb cream cheese. Roll up, slice and serve immediately.

name: Egg Salad
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl. Start with 1/3 cup yogurt. olive oil and keep adding until it reaches your desired consistency.
Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate until ready to serve with slices of bread.

name: Egg Salad With Bacon And Bell Pepper
instructions: In a medium skillet bring water to a boil, add eggs and cook until hard-boiled, about 8 minutes. Peel and chop.
In a pan fry bacon, until crispy, about 5 minutes.
In a bowl add yogurt, mustard, chives minced garlic, ground pepper, salt, smoked paprika, bell pepper, lemon juice. Whisk well until combined.
Add this mixture and bacon to a bowl, stir together and serve.

name: Egg White Cups With Spinach And Tomato
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350˚F.
Lightly grease a muffin tin with olive oil. Then divide equally the spinach across 6 cups.
Mix together egg whites and eggs. Set aside.
Fill the cups with tomato, cheese, and eggs. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 15 minutes.

name: Eggplant Bolognese
instructions: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium heat.
Cook pork sausage, breaking it onto smaller pieces with a wooden spoon, until browned, about 5 minutes.
Add ground beef, cook and stir until beef is browned and crumbly, about 5 minutes. Drain excess fat.
Pour remaining olive oil over sausage mixture, add eggplant, onion, garlic, salt, and black pepper.
Cook and stir until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Add mushrooms and continuing cooking until tender, about 5 minutes.
Mix crushed tomatoes, diced tomatoes, parsley, oregano, and basil into sausage mixture; bring to a boil.
Cover Dutch oven, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for 30 minutes.
Stir zucchini noodles into the sauce with tongs, cook and stir until the zucchini is slightly tender, 2 to 3 minutes. Top with Parmesan.

name: Eggplant Caponata
instructions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute eggplant, onion, and garlic until lightly browned, 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes, red wine, and capers and simmer until heated through, about 5 minutes.
Mix oregano, cinnamon, and cocoa powder into eggplant mixture; simmer until thickened, 20 minutes.
Place bread slices into toaster and toast for 5 minutes, until lightly crispy.
Spread the caponata on the toasted bread and serve.

name: Eggplant Meatballs
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Grease foil with olive oil.
Arrange eggplant halves cut-sides-down onto the prepared baking sheet. Pierce skin of eggplant several times with a fork.
Roast eggplant in preheated oven until soft, 30 to 40 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside to cool completely.
Scoop the flesh from the eggplant halves onto a cutting board; chop into small chunks and put into a large mixing bowl.
Mix ground turkey, carrot, onion, Parmesan cheese, egg, garlic, basil, parsley, oregano, sea salt, and black pepper with the eggplant chunks until ingredients are mixed.
Gently mix almond flour into the eggplant mixture; scoop with an ice cream scoop onto the prepared baking sheet.
Reduce oven heat to 350°F and bake meatballs in oven for 15 minutes, flip the meatballs, and bakefor 10 minutes more.
While the meatballs bake, heat marinara sauce in saucepan over medium-low heat until hot, add baked meatballs to the sauce and stir to coat.

name: Eggplant With Tomato And Pesto
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Lightly season each eggplant piece with paprika, salt, and pepper. On an oiled baking pan, bake eggplant rounds for about 15 minutes.
Place eggplant rounds in a baking dish, and evenly layer each round with pesto, mozzarella, and tomato.
Bake for 15 minutes and serve.

name: Elote
instructions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat.
Grill corn until hot and lightly charred all over, 7 to 10 minutes, depending on the temperature of the grill.
Roll the ears in melted ghee, then spread evenly with mayonnaise. Sprinkle with cheese and serve with a lime wedge.

name: Farinata
instructions: Preheat oven to 480°F.
In a bowl, add chickpea flour, salt, 1 cup water and blend with an immersion blender for 5 minutes till completely smooth.
Add the oil to the baking sheet and spread it out evenly.
Gently pour the chickpea batter into the center of the pan, but first over a spoon and not pouring directly into the pan.
Bake for 15 minutes and serve.

name: Farmer'S Casserole
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Arrange potatoes evenly in the bottom of the dish. Sprinkle with cheese, ham, and green onion.
In a large bowl combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour egg mixture over potato mixture in dish.
Bake for 35 minutes and serve.

name: Faux Kin Noodle Soup
instructions: Saute carrots, celery, onion, leek, and shallot in a soup pot over medium-high heat until onion is translucent and carrots lose their crunch, 7 to 10 minutes.
Pour broth over vegetables in the pot and bring to a rolling boil. Dissolve bouillon into broth, reduce heat to a simmer.
Add parsley, bay leaves, thyme, nutritional yeast, salt, and pepper. Cook until carrots are soft, about 10 minutes more.
Add pasta and seitan and cook until pasta is al dente, another 7 to 10 minutes.

name: Fava Beans Fettucine
instructions: Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente, 10 minutes.
Place beans in a sieve, rinse and let drain. Blanch beans in salted boiling water, 5 minutes. Drain and rinse thoroughly with cold water.
In a pan, saute garlic until translucent. Stir in tomato sauce, fava beans, and tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper, and saute 5 minutes.
Drain pasta and add to pan with vegetables. Toss briefly to combine and divide among bowls. Garnish with some hemp seeds.

name: Fennel And Cucumber Salad
ingredientLines: A pinch of fresh mint leaves, to garnish
Fresh cracked black pepper, to taste
instructions: Combine the fennel, celery, cucumbers and shallots in a salad bowl. Add the olive oil and lemon juice, add salt and pepper to taste, and toss.
Transfer to a serving plate, add fresh mint leaves and serve.

name: Feta, Watermelon, And Mint Salad
instructions: Toss watermelon cubes, mint leaves, onion slices, and feta in a salad bowl.

name: Fettuccine With Sweet Pepper-Cayenne Sauce
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Meanwhile, spray cooking oil in a large skillet and saute red bell peppers, garlic and cayenne pepper over medium heat for 3 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and broth and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in cheese.
Toss hot pasta with sauce and season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve imemdiately.

name: Fideo
instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Cook chicken breasts in the oil until nicely browned on the outside. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
Add remaining oil to the skillet, and add the broken spaghetti. Cook, stirring constantly until spaghetti is browned.
Drain off any excess oil, and add tomatoes and onion. Dice the chicken breasts, and return them to the skillet.
Season with cumin, chili powder, salt and pepper. Pour in water, cover, and simmer over medium-low heat for about 10 minutes.
Check towards the end, and add more water if necessary.
Spoon the chicken mixture into bowls to serve, and garnish with shredded cheese and sour cream.

name: Filet Mignon With Gorgonzola Sauce
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°F.
Put cheese in a bowl. Pour in the cream and the wine, enough to obtain a creamy consistency after mixing the ingredients.
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add the asparagus and broccoli then cook for 10 minutes.
Heat the butter in a heavy pan over medium heat. Add the filets then saute for 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare, turning them once.
Put the filets and vegetables on the plates. Cover with the sauce and serve.

name: Fish And Artichoke
instructions: In a large, deep skillet, melt the butter and add onion and artichoke, for about 5 minutes.
Add stock, season with salt and pepper, and bring to a boil. Simmer for 3 minutes.
In a pan, heat olive oil. Add seasoned cod fillets with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, until a little browned. Flip and cook for 3 minutes more.
Serve on a plate, garnished with chopped parsley.

name: Fish Chowder
ingredientLines: Finely ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat.
Add garlic and onion, cook for 5 minutes until translucent but not golden. Add carrots and stir through. Turn heat up to high and add wine.
Stir then let it simmer rapidly until it's mostly evaporated. Add flour and stir for 30 seconds - it will become sludgy!
Slow pour in broth while stirring to dissolve paste, then stir in milk. Add potato, corn, salt and pepper.
Bring to simmer then turn heat down so it's simmering gently.
Cook, stirring every now and then, for 8 minutes or until potato is almost cooked.
Add fish and peas, simmer for 3 minutes or until fish is just cooked (should flake easily).
Adjust salt and pepper to taste. If soup is too thick, add a touch of water or milk.
Serve, garnished with green onions and crusty bread on the side for dunking!

name: Fish In Foil
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Cook the rice in a pot of water according to the instructions on the packaging.
Rinse and pat fillets dry. Rub fillets with olive oil, and season with garlic salt and black pepper. Place each fillet on a large sheet of aluminum foil.
Top with jalapeno slices, and squeeze the juice from the ends of the lemon over fillets. Arrange remaining lemon slices on top of fillets.
Carefully seal all edges of the foil to form enclosed packets. Place packets on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes.

name: Fish With Tomatoes And Olives
instructions: Heat oil in a large non-stick pan over medium heat. Season both sides of the fish with salt and pepper.
Fry the fish until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Carefully flip the fillets over and continue cooking for a further 2 minutes.
Add in the onion and garlic, and fry until fragrant. Add in the tomatoes, wine, lemon juice, and olives, and continue cooking until the fish has cooked through.

name: Flank Steak Fajitas
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Mix all fajita seasoning ingredients in a bowl.
Marinate steak with 2 tbsp of fajita seasoning, lime juice, cilantro, garlic, and half of the olive oil and refrigerate for 15 minutes.
When ready to cook, heat the remaining oil in skillet and saute bell peppers along with 1 tsp of fajita seasoning. Cook for 5 minutes, then set aside.
In the same skillet, stir in marinated steak strips. Keep on stirring on high flame to give it a quick sear. Cook for 2 minutes.
Arrange the fajitas along with peppers in skillet or platter and serve.

name: Focaccia Muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Heat a medium pan on medium-high heat, add olive oil, onion, and garlic. Cook for 3 minutes until the onion and garlic become translucent.
Add in basil, parsley, oregano, and thyme, cook for 3 minutes until the herbs are well combined and aromatic.
Add sun-dried tomatoes and olives, cook through for 1 minute, and then remove from the heat. Let cool slightly.
To a large bowl, add flour, baking powder, and salt. Mix to combine. Then add water, olive oil, and apple cider vinegar to the dry ingredients. Mix.
Add the onion and sun-dried tomato mixture from the pan to the bowl and carefully mix it through the batter until just combined. Careful not to over-mix.
Divide the batter between the muffin tin wells. Put an olive and a sprig of fresh thyme on top for decoration. Bake for 20 minutes.

name: French Toast Sticks
instructions: Cut each slice of bread into thirds to make sticks. Cut a piece of parchment paper to fit the bottom of the air fryer basket.
Preheat air fryer to 360°F.
Stir together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a bowl until well combined.
Dip each piece of bread into egg mixture, making sure each piece is well submerged.
Shake each bread stick to remove excess liquid and place in a single layer in the air fryer basket.
Cook in batches, if necessary, to avoid overcrowding the fryer.
Cook for 5 minutes, turn bread pieces, and cook for an additional 5 minutes.

name: Fresh Greek Salad
instructions: Place all vegetabled in a mixing bowl. Season with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Garnish with some chopped parsley, feta cheese and serve.

name: Fresh Vegan Pasta Salad
instructions: Cook the pasta according to pack instructions, about 10 minutes.
Put the lime juice and zest in a medium bowl with cherry tomatoes, avocado, bell pepper, lettuce, salt, pepper, olive oil, and mix all together.
Drain the pasta, toss it into the bowl and mix well. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.

name: Fresh Vegetable Soup
ingredientLines: 4 oz broccoli florets, cut into small pieces
instructions: In a small skillet heat olive oil, add onion and cook for 3 minutes.
Add vegetable broth, salt, pepper and 2 cups of water.
Add beans, corn, peas, broccoli and cauliflower florets. Bring to a boil and simmer for 25 minutes.

name: Fried Eggs With Truffles
instructions: Put oil in a saucepan and heat over meduim heat.
Break the eggs into the pan. Cover the pan with a lid and simmer for 3 minutes.
Remove the lid, and lay the eggs on a plate. Sprinkle with the black truffle shavings and season with salt and pepper.
Place on a plate with some lettuce and serve.

name: Fried Mussels Skewers
instructions: Pierce the cleaned mussels onto the bamboo skewers.
Separate the egg yolks from the egg whites in two bowls. Whisk the egg whites with a pinch of salt for 3minutes.
Add 2 tbsp of flour, lemon juice, the beer and a pinch of salt to the egg yolks. Whisk to achieve a thick cream. Fold in the eggwhites and mix them gently.
Heat the oil. Dip the mussels skewers into the batter and fry until golden brown. Place the fried mussels on a piece of kitchen paper, to absorb the excess oil.

name: Fried Rice With Broccoli
instructions: In a medium skillet bring salted water to a boil. Add rice and cook according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Steam broccoli, covered, 2 minutes. Rinse with cold water. Drain.
Combine eggs and 2 tbsp water. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add egg mixture. Stir-fry 30 seconds or until soft-scrambled, stirring constantly. Remove egg mixture from pan.
Add oil to a pan. Add ginger and garlic. Stir-fry 30 seconds. Add rice and stir-fry 3 minutes.
Add broccoli, carrot, and broth. Cook 1 minute. Add cooked eggs, soy sauce, and salt. Stir-fry 1 minute or until thoroughly heated. Sprinkle with parsley.

name: Fried Salmon And Orange Salad
instructions: Season salmon filets with salt, pepper, and paprika. Heat olive oil and bake salmon for 5 minutes on each side.
In a medium bowl mix together oranges, onion, salt, pepper, and oil.
For Hollandaise sauce in a small bowl add egg yolks, lemon juice, mustard, salt and pepper and blend.
Place salmon on a plate with salad and Hollandaise sauce, and serve.

name: Fudgy Eggplant Brownies
ingredientLines: ¼ cup dutch processed cocoa powder
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
Peel the eggplant, then cut in half lengthwise. Scoop out the seeds, then chop into large pieces.
Transfer to a steamer basket set over a large pot of simmering water, cover, and steam for 20 minutes, until the eggplant is very soft.
Transfer the hot eggplant to the bowl of the food processor with 2 oz chocolate chips, the unsweetened chocolate, milk, maple syrup, and vanilla extract.
The heat from the eggplant will melt the chocolate. Blend on high speed for 2 minutes, until very smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed.
In a bowl, beat eggs, then add the flour, cocoa powder, salt, and whisk to combine. Add the eggplant mixture and fold with a spatula. Add remaining chocolate chips.
Transfer the batter to a greased 8-inch square baking dish and smooth the top. Bake for 35 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Fusilli With Peas And Sausage
ingredientLines: ¼ lb sweet Italian sausage, casings removed
⅓ cup tbsp grated Parmesan cheese
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a skillet heat oil and saute garlic over medium heat. Brown sausage in skillet. Once brown add frozen peas and simmer for 5 minutes.
Slowly add heavy cream and butter to skillet and bring to a slight boil. Add more cream if necessary.
Cook for 5 minutes. Add tomatoes and spinach and cook for 2 minutes. Toss with cooked pasta and top with Parmesan cheese.

name: Garlic And Herb Shirmp
instructions: Place salt, lemon zest, juice, and 3 cloves garlic in bowl of a mortar and pestle. Pound with the pestle until mixture begins to form a paste, about 2 minutes.
Add chopped basil, parsley, pepper flakes, oregano, and thyme and pound with pestle until mixture begin to come together, about 5 minutes.
Drizzle about 1 tablespoon of the olive oil into herb mixture. Grind together until mixture begins to form a sauce for marinating, about 1 minute.
Place shrimp in a large bowl and mix. Place on a pan and cook for 5 minutes on each side.

name: Garlic Avocado Spread
instructions: Soak cashews in a bowl of water, 8 hours to overnight.
Combine cashews, avocado, lime juice, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, and salt in a blender, blend until smooth.

name: Garlic Butter Steak Bites
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Heat oil in skillet over high heat. Once hot, add in steak bites and season with salt and pepper. Cook 2 minutes undisturbed. Stir, cook another 2 minutes. Set aside.
Reduce heat to medium and add butter to same pan. Once melted, add garlic and parsley and cook about a minute, stirring.
Remove from heat. Add steak bites back into pan and toss well. Serve immediately.

name: Garlic Chili Prawns In Tomato Sauce
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Add the olive oil to the pan over a medium heat and fry the spring onions for 2 minutes. Add the garlic and fry for a further 30 seconds.
Add the fresh tomatoes to the pan and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir the arrowroot into the prawns and add them to the pan. Stir into the tomatoes.
Season with salt and pepper and stir in the tomato puree and tobasco sauce. Add the coriander and most of the parsley.
Simmer the sauce for 6 minutes and serve hot.

name: Garlic Shrimp Linguine
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente, drain. In another pot boil broccoli for 5 to 8 minutes.
In a medium saucepan, melt ghee over medium low heat, add wine, cheese, garlic, parslet, salt and pepper to taste. Simmer over low heat for 3 to 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Increase heat to medium high and add shrimp to saucepan, cook for about 3 to 4 minutes or until shrimp begins to turn pink.
Divide pasta into portions, add broccoli and spoon sauce on top, garnish with Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley, if desired.

name: Garlic-Bacon Green Beans
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly browned but only slightly crisp.
Drain grease, leaving a small amount in the skillet for later use. Crumble bacon, reserving some for garnish, and set aside.
Cook frozen beans in a covered, microwavable dish for about 3 minutes until thawed, but not fully cooked. Drain liquid, pat dry, and set aside.
Reheat skillet with residual bacon grease over medium-high heat. Stir in bacon and garlic until garlic is lightly golden.
Add green beans and season with onion powder and black pepper. Cook and stir for 1 minute.
Transfer to a serving dish, and garnish with remaining crumbled bacon. Serve hot.

name: Garlic-Dijon Mashed Cauliflower
instructions: Cut the cauliflower into roughly equal chunks. Steam for 8 minutes.
While it’s steaming, chop the garlic and put half the oil in a frying pan along with the garlic and fry for 3 mintues. Then turn the heat off but let the pan sit there.
When the cauliflower is ready put it into a bowl and add the garlic and oil infusion, the rest of the oil, nutritional yeast, nutmeg, mustard and salt.
Give it a quick blend with a hand blender, then serve immediately.

name: Gazpacho
ingredientLines: 6 oz bread, sliced and crust removed
instructions: Place the bread slices in a bowl with ½ cup of water. Let the bread soak while you work on the tomatoes. Squeeze the bread to ring out any water.
Place the tomatoes in a large pot of boiling water for 40 seconds. With a slotted spoon, remove the tomatoes from the boiling water and let them cool for about a minute and peel the skin off.

Place the tomatoes, cucumbers, celery, bell peppers, green onions and garlic in blender. Top with soaked bread, olive oil and sherry vinegar. Add the salt, pepper, cumin, cayenne pepper and blend all together,
Transfer to a glass container or large canning jars. Cover tightly and chill in refrigerator.
When ready to serve, give the gazpacho a quick stir then transfer to serving bowls. Top with olive oil and a garnish of fresh basil, chopped cucumber and tomatoes.

name: Ginger And Turmeric Smoothie
ingredientLines: ¾ tsp finely grated peeled ginger
1 oz unflavored pea protein powder (or other)
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a high-powered blender. Serve immediately.

name: Ginger Beef Stir-Fry With Bok Choy
ingredientLines: 4 oz beef steak, trimmed and chopped
1 lb baby bok choy, trimmed and chopped
instructions: Combine the beef, ginger, soy sauce, and arrowroot powder in a medium bowl. Stir well. Add sesame oil and stir until the beef is lightly coated.
Combine oyster-flavored sauce and the sherry in a small bowl. Set aside.
Heat a 14-inch flat-bottomed carbon-steel wok over high heat. Swirl in olive oil. Add beef and cook for 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate.
Add bok choy and broth to the pan. Cover and cook until the bok choy greens are bright green and almost all the liquid has been absorbed, about 1 minute.
Return the beef to the pan, add the reserved sauce, and stir-fry until the beef is just cooked through and the bok choy is tender-crisp, about 1 minute. Serve immediately.

name: Glass Noodle Soup
ingredientLines: 9 oz skinless, boneless chicken breasts, sliced
instructions: Soak the bean threads in a large bowl of hot water until soft, about 15 minutes,drain and cut into bite-size lengths. Divide the noodles into 3 bowls.
Bring the chicken broth, garlic, ginger, and lemongrass to a boil in a large saucepan, reduce heat to medium-low and cook the mixture at a simmer until fragrant.
Add the chicken and shrimp to the soup, simmer until the chicken pieces are cooked through, 3 to 5 minutes.
Stir the lime juice and fish sauce through the soup. Ladle the soup over the noodles, top with green onion to serve.

name: Glazed Salmon With Wilted Spinach
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F and lay baking tray with baking paper.
Place orange juice, honey, ginger and garlic in a small pan over medium heat, and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes or until slightly reduced and syrupy.
Place salmon on prepared tray. Reserve half the glaze. Use remaining glaze to brush over salmon fillets. Bake for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large frypan over high heat. Add the baby spinach leaves and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes, until just wilted. Season.
To serve, divide the wilted spinach and salmon fillets among serving plates and garnish with some sprigs of thyme.

name: Gnocchi Alla Sorrentina
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Cook potatoes in a large pot of boiling water for 20 minutes or until soft. Drain and cool.
Push the potatoes through a potato ricer into a large bowl or onto a floured bench top. Sprinkle over the salt.
Thoroughly combine the flour and potatoes, scrunching it together with your hands and forming into a dough.
Turn the dough onto a floured bench and roll into a large log shape. Divide into 8 pieces.
Roll each piece into a long rope. Then cut into small pieces. Place pieces onto a tray lined with a fresh towel until you are ready to cook them.
Heat oil in a medium pan and add the garlic. Lower the heat and cook garlic for approximately 1 minute.
Pour in the passata and salt. Cover and simmer for approximately 10 minutes.
In a medium pot over medium to high heat, pour in the soy milk and immediately whisk in the corn starch until dissolved.
Add the remaining ingredients and stir briskly to combine. Stir frequently until the sauce becomes thick.
In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook the gnocchi in batches. When the gnocchi float to the surface, carefully remove and drain.
Transfer gnocchi to the tomato sugo and stir to coat. Pour the gnocchi into a large baking or casserole dish. Dollop the mozzarella sauce on top.
Bake for 10 minutes and serve.

name: Gnocchi With Chorizo And Peas
instructions: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large frying pan. Add the prosciutto slices and fry until crisp, turning occasionally.
Drain on kitchen paper, then break into shards.
Add the gnocchi to the pan and fry for 8 minutes until lightly golden on both sides. Add chorizo and cook for a minute more.
Add the peas, a little salt and pepper, and a splash of water to the pan and warm through.
Add the pesto and another splash of water, if needed, and stir to coat well.

name: Gnocchi With Spinach And Tomatoes
instructions: Preheat the oven to 390°F.
Add the cherry tomatoes to a roasting tin, drizzle over ½ a tbsp of balsamic vinegar and 1 tbsp of olive oil, add ¼ tsp each of salt and black pepper then roast them for about 15 minutes.
Bring a large saucepan of salted water to a boil. Add the gnocchi to the water and as soon as they rise to the top, about 3 minutes, remove with a slotted spoon.
In a large frying pan add 2 tbsp of butter, melt the butter over a medium to high heat then once the butter is bubbling add the gnocchi.
Fry the gnocchi for a maximum of 5 minutes, tossing regularly. Once the gnocchi is golden brown remove it from the pan.
Add the minced garlic and cook for a minute then add the spinach.
The spinach will wilt quite quickly so now add the grated cheese, the cherry tomatoes along with any juices in the roasting tin.

name: Gnocchi With Tomato Sauce
instructions: Begin by boiling the gnocchi according to package instructions. Strain the gnocchi and add it to a cast iron skillet.
Add the canned tomatoes, red pepper, milk, nutritional yeast, chili flakes, and garlic powder to a blender. Blend until smooth.
Then, add the sauce to the same skillet with the gnocchi.
Turn on the heat and cook the gnocchi and sauce in the skillet for about 5 minutes to thicken and heat the sauce.
Serve garnished with chopped parsley.

name: Goat Cheese Stuffed Celery
ingredientLines: 8 oz celery, rinsed, cut in half
instructions: Combine goat cheese, red bell pepper, garlic, and basil in a blender. Blend until smooth.
Divide the goat cheese mixture between the celery stalks, stuffing the curved indent of the veggie. Serve immediately.

name: Greek Grilled Chicken
instructions: Whisk garlic, oregano, red pepper flakes, black pepper, lemon juice, olive oil, and vinegar together in a large bowl.
Make 2 slashes on the skin side down to the bone in the thigh section and 1 in the leg section of each leg quarter.
Season both sides of chicken generously with kosher salt.
Transfer to bowl with marinade and thoroughly coat all sides. Cover and marinate in refrigerator 4 to 12 hours.
Transfer chicken to paper-towel-lined sheet pan to drain slightly.
Place leg quarters on grill skin side down over semi-direct heat. Cook 6 or 7 minutes.
Turn chicken and cook another 6 to 7 minutes. Continue cooking and turning for 8 to 10 more minutes.

name: Greek Omelet
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk the eggs with a fork and season with salt and pepper, to taste. Set aside.
Heat a small skillet over medium heat and add the oil. Pour in the egg mixture and cook until almost set, about 5 minutes.
Place the chopped tomato and feta on one half of the omelet and fold the other half over top. Remove from heat and top with parsley.

name: Greek Peas With Tomato And Dill
ingredientLines: ½ potato, peeled and cut into wedges
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat and cook onions until soft but not browned, about 5 minutes.
Add peas, carrots, tomatoes, potato, dill, salt, and pepper. Add water if there is not enough liquid from the tomatoes.
Stir thoroughly and bring to a boil. Lower heat and cook, partially covered, until peas and potato are soft, about 30 minutes.
Ensure that any remaining water from the tomatoes has evaporated before serving.

name: Greek Salmon
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Pat dry salmon fillets and place skin-side down on a lined quarter sheet baking pan.
In a small mixing bowl, stir to combine olive oil, lemon juice, dill, garlic, salt, and pepper. Brush or pour the marinade over the salmon and let it sit.
Bake for 15 minutes. Let rest for 5 minutes, then serve.

name: Greek Shrimp With Tomatoes & Feta
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a bowl, mix in 1 tbsp olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper with shrimp. Toss well to cover the shrimp all over.
In a pan, heat olive oil on medium high heat and sauté the onions till soft and starting to turn brown, about 5minutes.
Add in sliced garlic along with red chili flakes and oregano and saute for a minute. Add in wine and cook for 2 minutes.
Add in tomatoes, stir well. Add parsley and simmer for 10 minutes. Add in marinated shrimp and stir well. Cover and cook for 5 minutes.
Open the lid and sprinkle feta all over. Cover and cook another 5 minutes. Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

name: Greek Spinach Rice
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add rice and stir until every grain is coated in oil and you hear it start to sizzle.
Stir in some salt, pepper, cayenne, and green onions and cook for about 1 minute. Add dill, spinach, and 2 cups of water. Mix well and bring to a simmer.
Cover, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook until rice is tender, about 20 minutes. Uncover and stir well. Cover again and let sit for 5 minutes.
Divide rice mixture evenly into six bowls. Squeeze some lemon over each serving, then top with feta cheese and chili flakes before serving.

name: Greek Stewed Green Beans
ingredientLines: ¾ lb fresh green beans, trimmed
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat and stir in onion. Cook until onion has softened, about 5 minutes.
Add green beans and stir to coat in the oil. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes. Add pureed tomato, potatoes, salt, and pepper.
Stir well, then add water until beans are barely covered. Bring to a simmer, partially cover with a lid, and cook gently over medium-low heat for 20 minutes.
Uncover towards the end of cooking to reduce sauce if it is too watery. Serve imemdiately.

name: Greek Style Garlic Chicken Breast
instructions: Cut 3 slits in each chicken breast to allow marinade to penetrate.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, pepper, and paprika for about 30 seconds.
Place chicken in a large bowl, and pour marinade over. Using your hands, work marinade into chicken. Cover, and refrigerate overnight
Preheat grill for medium heat, and lightly oil grate.
Cook chicken on grill until meat is no longer pink and juices run clear.

name: Greek Tomato Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat and cook onion and garlic until soft and translucent, about 3 minutes. Add rice and cook 2 minutes.
Add broth, tomato sauce, salt, and pepper and bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to low.
Cook until all the liquid is absorbed and rice is done, about 20 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Greek White Bean Soup
instructions: Heat 2 tbsp oil in a soup pot over medium high heat. Saute onion, celery, carrot, garlic and salt for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Add tomato paste and stir for one minute. Add crushed tomatoes, beans, broth, rosemary, chili flakes and bay leaves. Stir well.
Bring to low boil then simmer on low to medium heat for 30 minutes, until carrots are soft.
Remove one cup of beans to a bowl and mash with a spoon. Stir back into pot. Add remaining oil and whisk into the soup. Serve immediately.

name: Green Rice Casserole
ingredientLines: 3 oz green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Butter a 2 quart casserole or cast iron pan and set aside.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, about three-quarters of the cheddar, ricotta, sour cream, and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Mix till well blended.
Add in spinach, bell pepper, and scallions and mix till well blended.
Scrape the mixture into the prepared casserole. Sprinkle the remaining cheddar cheese evenly over the top and bake till golden, about 30 minutes.
Rest for 5 minutes and serve.

name: Green Soup
instructions: Warm the oil in a large sauce pan and lightly fry the onion and garlic, for around 5 minutes.
Add the broccoli, including stalks and leaves, and cover with boiling water. Bring to the boil and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the peas and spinach, ceason with salt and pepper, and simmer for a further 10 minutes.
Remove from the heat and blend until smooth. Top with sour cream and serve.

name: Green Spinach Waffles
instructions: Separate egg whites from egg yolks. Add spinach, butter, yolks, flour, baking powder, nutmeg and salt to the blender and process until you have an smooth batter.
In a medium sized bowl whip egg whites until they reach stiff peaks.
Add the batter and grated cheese and fold everything together with a spatula, trying to incorporate most of the egg whites air into the batter.
Heat a waffle iron and bake waffles. Serve immediately with tomatoes and basil.

name: Grill Master Chicken Wings
instructions: Prepare wings, Combine chicken wings, soy sauce, and Italian dressing in a large resealable plastic bag.
Coat chicken wings with marinade, squeeze out excess air, and seal the bag. Marinate in the refrigerator, 4 hours to overnight.
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Prepare sauce, Melt ghee in a small saucepan over low heat. Stir in hot pepper sauce and soy sauce until combined. Remove from heat and set aside.
Remove chicken wings from marinade and pat dry, discard any remaining marinade.
Cook on the preheated grill, turning occasionally, until chicken is browned and no longer pink, 25 to 30 minutes.
Place grilled wings in a large bowl. Pour sauce over wings, toss until well-coated.

name: Grilled Asparagus Salad
instructions: Preheat a grill for low heat. Combine the lemon juice and olive oil on a plate. Place asparagus on the plate, and roll around to coat.
Grill asparagus for about 5 minutes, turning at least once, and brushing with the olive oil mixture.
Remove from the grill, and place back onto the plate with the oil.
In a large bowl, combine the spinach, feta cheese, and strawberries
Cut asparagus into bite-size pieces, and add to the salad along with the lemon juice and oil from the plate.
Toss to blend, then serve.

name: Grilled Chicken And Tomatoes
instructions: Season chicken. In large skillet, cook the chicken on a grill, 5 minutes per side.
Transfer to platter. Repeat with remaining chicken and oil. Add wine, tomatoes to skillet.
Simmer until tomatoes burst and sauce thickens slightly, 5 minutes. Off heat, swirl in butter. Season sauce and spoon over chicken.

name: Grilled Chicken Parmesan
ingredientLines: 1 lb chicken breasts, boneless and skinless
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F.
Bring out oven-safe plate and pour two-thirds of the marinara sauce at the bottom of the plate. Set aside.
Preheat a cast-iron grill pan over medium heat and add in the olive oil.
Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper and dried oregano on both sides.
When the pan is ready, sear the chicken on each side for 3 minutes. Remove the chicken onto the marinara sauce in the oven safe plate.
Place pesto on top of each chicken breast and spread it on the entire piece of chicken and then place 2 tbsp of marinara sauce on top of each chicken breast.
Sprinkle the cheese and parsley on top and place the plate in the oven for 15 minutes.

name: Grilled Chicken Zucchini Salad
instructions: In a mixing bowl mix together lettuce, arugula, and cherry tomatoes. Season with oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Place zucchini slices and chicken breasts on a grill and grill for 3 minutes on each side. Slice chicken breasts.
Place salad mixture on serving plate, top with slices of zucchini and chicken, and serve.

name: Grilled Cilantro Salmon
instructions: In a small saucepan over medium-low heat, stir together cilantro, garlic, molasses, and lime juice.
Heat until the molasses is easily stirred, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat, and let cool slightly.
Place salmon steaks in a baking dish, and season with salt and pepper.
Pour marinade over salmon, cover, and refrigerate 10 minutes.
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.
Lightly oil grill grate. Place salmon steaks on grill, cook 5 minutes on each side, or until fish is easily flaked with a fork.

name: Grilled Halloumi With Vegetables
instructions: Place sliced halloumi cheese on a grill about 3 minutes on each side.
Place vegetables on a plate, and season with salt and pepper.
On the vegetables place grilled halloumi, and drizzle with olive oil. Serve.

name: Grilled Rye Sandwiches
instructions: Spread butter on one side of each bread slice then spread pesto on other side of bread slice.
Place spinach, avocado slices, and cheese on bread and sandwich put together.
Heat skillet on medium high and cook sandwich on each side for approx. 3 minutes until golden brown.

name: Grilled Salmon Salad
instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper and cook on a grill for about 5 minutes on each side. When done, slice the salmon on small chunks.
In a bowl mix all other ingredients and season with olive oil, salt and lemon juice.
Place salad mix and salmon chunks on a platter and serve.

name: Grilled Spatchcooked Greek Chicken
instructions: Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, garlic, rosemary, and tarragon together in a measuring cup.
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Place chicken on a rimmed baking sheet. Pour 1/2 of the oil mixture over the chicken and reserve the remaining 1/2.
Using your hands, massage the oil mixture into the chicken skin. Season with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken skin-side up over indirect heat for 50 minutes. Move chicken over direct heat and grill 5 minutes.
Carefully flip chicken over skin-side down and grill until skin is brown and crispy, about 5 more minutes.
Transfer chicken to a serving platter and let rest for 10 minutes. Drizzle reserved oil mixture over the chicken.

name: Grilled Tilapia With Veggies
instructions: Preheat a grill to medium-high heat 375°F.
Rub tilapia fillets with olive oil and sprinkle with salt, smoked paprika, garlic powder, onion powder and grill for 5 minutes on each side.
Serve with tomatoes, bell peppers, seasoned with salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar.

name: Grilled Tuna
instructions: Place tuna steaks with sour cream and seasoning  in a bowl, coating both sides, marinate in refrigerator for 20 minutes.
Preheat outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate.
Grill tuna on the preheated grill until tuna lightens in color but retains a thin line of pink in the center, about 5 minutes on each side.

name: Ground Beef Casserole
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a casserole dish.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
Mix salt, garlic salt and tomato sauce into ground beef, simmer until flavors blend, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat, cover skillet, and cool to room temperature.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally for about 5 minutes.
Mix sour cream, cream cheese, and onion in a bowl. Scoop half the noodles into the prepared casserole dish, top with half the sour cream mixture.
Spoon half the ground beef mixture atop sour cream layer. Repeat layering with remaining ingredients. Top casserole with Cheddar cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven until Cheddar cheese has browned, 25 to 30 minutes.

name: Guacamole With Nopales
instructions: Heat a small nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add nopales and cook, stirring occasionally, until soft, about 10 minutes. Let cool.
Mash avocado in a bowl with lime juice, olive oil, and salt. Stir in tomato, jalapeno, cilantro, and cooked nopales.

name: Ham And Pesto Crostini
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Place the bread on the trays. Spray with a little olive oil. Bake, turning once, for 10 minutes
Meanwhile, prepare pesto cream cheese. In a bowl, stir cream cheese with a fork to soften it up. Add pesto and mix well to incorporate.
Spread the pesto on the bread, top with mozzarella and ham. Serve.

name: Ham Frittata With Vegetables
instructions: In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Cook bell pepper, onion, and ham for 3 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, beat eggs, milk, salt, and pepper with a fork or wire whisk until well mixed.
Pour egg mixture over ham mixture. Cook over medium heat 10 minutes, stirring gently, until eggs are almost set. Reduce heat to low.
Top with tomato slices and cheese. Cover and cook 3 minutes.

name: Ham Fritters
instructions: Sift flour and baking powder into a bowl. Add sliced spring onions, chopped parsley, corn and ham. Season with salt and pepper and stir to combine.
Make a well in the centre, add eggs and milk, then stir to form a batter.
Heat a frying pan, add a film of oil and drop heaped tablespoonfuls of the batter into the pan. Cook for 3 minutes on each side.

name: Ham With Red Eye Gravy
instructions: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir chopped hams until browned, about 5 minutes.
Remove to a plate, reserving the grease in the pan.
Place ham slices in the pan and cook over medium heat until browned, about 5 minutes on each side.
Season both sides with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Remove ham and reserve on a plate.
Reduce heat to medium-low and sprinkle flour over the pan drippings. Cook and stir for 2 minutes.

name: Healthier Hot Legs
instructions: In a medium bowl, stir together the chili garlic sauce and hot sauce. Set aside.
Melt ghee in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the drumsticks, and cook until browned on the outside, turning as needed.
Reduce heat to medium-low, and spoon sauce over the chicken to coat.
Simmer, stirring occasionally, until chicken has cooked through and sauce is thick and sticky, about 20 minutes.

name: Hearty Red Lentil Stew
instructions: In a medium sauce pan, cook the onion in oil over medium heat, until softened and golden, about 5 minutes.
Add the garlic, ginger, curry, cumin, turmeric, chili, and salt. Cook for 1 minute, and then reduce the heat to medium-low.
At this point, add red lentils, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Cook, stirring often, for 25 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Hoisin Glazed Salmon
instructions: Whisk together the soy sauce, hoisin sauce, chili sauce, lemon juice, ginger, garlic, and olive oil in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Place the salmon fillets into the marinade, and turn to evenly coat. Cover the dish with plastic wrap, and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
Preheat an oven to 350°F.
Cook the rice in a pot od water accoriding to the instruction on the packaging.
Remove and discard the plastic wrap from the salmon, use a spoon to scoop up the marinade that has collected in the bottom of the baking dish, and drizzle it over the salmon fillets.
Bake in the preheated oven until the salmon flakes easily with a fork, about 30 minutes.

name: Honey Garlic Salmon
instructions: Pat the salmon fillets dry with paper towels and season them all over with salt and pepper. Sprinkle the smoked paprika over the tops of the fillets.
Heat a large oven proof skillet over medium high heat and add the ghee. Place the salmon skin side down and sear for about 3 minutes.
In a small bowl, whisk together all the sauce ingredients until well combined.
Once the salmon is halfway done, pour the sauce into the skillet and spoon over the salmon. Cook for 5 minutes.

name: Honey Walnut Shrimp
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a pot, add water, butter, and sugar. Turn the heat up to medium-high and mix until the sugar is fully dissolved.
Once the liquid starts boiling, add in walnuts and let it simmer for 5 minutes. Remove and set aside on some parchment paper.
Mix shrimp with tempura mix and cold sparkling water in a bowl.
Add oil to a pot and turn the heat up to medium-high. Once the oil is hot, add in the shrimp. Fry for 4 minutes and set aside.
In a bowl, add fried shrimp and candied walnuts and mix. Garnish with sesame seeds.

name: Hot And Sour Shrimp Soup
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Bring broth to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for about 5 minutes. Add mushrooms and shrimp and cook until shrimp have heated through, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the fish sauce, lime juice, green onion, cilantro and chile pepper. Taste and adjust salt and pepper if needed.
Soup should be sour, salty, spicy and hot. Serve imemdiately.

name: Hunan Shrimp
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Clean the shrimp and marinate it with salt, pepper and arrowroot powder while you prep the rest of the ingredients.
Mix sambal oelek, oyster sauce, rice vinegar and tomato paste in a bowl.
Heat half of the oil in a wok over medium high heat. Add shrimp and sear for a couple of minutes, till they get a little curled up and turn pink. Set aside.
Add remaining oil and turn the heat to high. Add in green beans and broccoli. Stir and cook for a couple of minutes, till they get little soft.
Stir in bell peppers, white parts of scallions, ginger and garlic. Stir fry for 4 minutes, then mix in the prepared Hunan sauce.
Add some water along with shrimp and stir fry for another 3 minutes. Garnish it with green parts of scallions.

name: Insalata Casprese
instructions: On a large platter, alternate and overlap the tomato slices, mozzarella cheese slices, and basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil. Season with sea salt and pepper.

name: Instant Pot Butternut Squash And Pumpkin Spice Soup
instructions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker and select Saute function. Heat oil and add onion.
Saute until translucent, about 2 minutes, be careful not to brown the onion. Move onion to the side of the pot.
Add a layer of butternut squash to the bottom of the pot. Brown slightly, about 4 minutes.
Add remaining butternut squash, curry powder, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Mix and continue cooking until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Pour broth and applesauce into the pot with the butternut squash mixture. Close and lock the lid, set knob to sealing.
Select high pressure and set timer for 15 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes. Unlock and remove lid.
Mix pumpkin puree and ghee into the pot with the soup. Blend with a stick blender. Add salt. Mix thoroughly.

name: Instant Pot Cabbage With Sausage
instructions: Pour chicken broth into the Instant Pot. Then add in the onion slices, smoked sausage, potatoes, cabbage and finally the butter.
Toss a bit and sprinkle with a little salt and pepper. Cover the pot and lock the lid into place.
Cook for 20 minutes and serve.

name: Instant Pot Easy Vegan Tomato And Basil Soup
instructions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker and select Saute function.
Heat olive oil and add onion, cook until translucent, about 7 minutes. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
Combine tomatoes, vegetable broth, basil, nutritional yeast, salt, ground black pepper, and Italian seasoning in the pot.
Close and lock the lid. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions, set timer for 5 minutes.
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove lid.
Blend with an immersion blender until creamy.

name: Instant Pot Spicy Beef Curry Stew
instructions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker and select Saute function.
Pour in olive oil and heat until sizzling, add meat and season with salt and pepper. Cook until browned, 5 to 7 minutes per side.
Transfer meat to a plate, reserving juices in the pot. Add jalapenos, garlic, and ginger to the pot.
Cook and stir until tender, about 2 minutes. Season with curry powder.
